analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol#125) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol#339-361)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol#450-467)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol#531-535) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol#272-290):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol#287-288)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol#289)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol#562-578) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol#574-577)

BISK.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol#498-499) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol#539-542)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol#531-535)
	- /unique_chucks/18/0x7c60538c2c5307152669993b8cdab82bfb4c33b5.sol#533-535
